options.name: --save
options.description: Do save workspace at the end of the session

options.name: --no-environ
options.description: Don't read the site and user environment files

options.name: --no-init-file
options.description: Don't read the user R profile

options.name: --restore
options.description: Do restore previously saved objects at startup

options.name: --default-packages
options.description: Comma separated list of default packages

args.name: packages
args.description: A comma-separated set of package names, or 'NULL'

args.name: args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the script
